subcloud_aim: SubCloud aims to overcome language barriers on the web through subtitles
free_request_ex_back: When there are subtitles, we will notify you as soon as possible
unconstrained_sub_production_ex_front: Make money and Build your career by making subtitles
unconstrained_sub_production_ex_back: You can receive user thanks as a notification
without_moving_front: Subtitles on video without moving website
without_moving_back: Subtitles can be loaded with a few clicks
landing_features_first_ex: Adjust the subtitle size, background and border color to your preference
landing_features_second_ex: Provides an environment for subtitle editing within the SubCloud site
landing_features_third_ex: Use the subtitles of the subtitlers you want by searching in the extension
landing_features_fourth_ex: Request subtitles for free with just one click of the request button. We will give you upload notification through a notification in SubCloud
get_touch_account: Get in touch or create an account
